rooms.description: Welcoming space with eco-friendly materials and natural lighting, aligning with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Open-plan area featuring energy-efficient LED lighting and reclaimed wood elements. West-facing aspect provides optimal evening sunlight; Vastu considerations ensure a balanced layout.
Compact eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, natural ventilation, and storage designed for efficient workflows.
Spacious master bedroom incorporating sustainable materials and large windows oriented to capture morning sunlight in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Cozy guest room integrating eco-friendly insulation and natural light. Designed for privacy and comfort.
Dedicated servant's quarters ensuring convenience and compliance with local norms; designed as a self-contained space.

notes.note: The design incorporates eco-friendly materials such as reclaimed wood, natural stone, and sustainable insulation. Vastu principles were considered for room placements; for instance, the living area is oriented towards the west while bedrooms favor east to capture morning light.
